changes: Improved predictions quality and width
Added world, US demographic data by gender to the database
Implemented rate of infection graph (new cases) plots
Shifted data model from schema on read to ontology
Selections of countries in global, US states, graph scale all saved in localStorage
Share buttons for Facebook, Twitter, Reddit and WhatsApp available for every graph now
Your country now shown in the navigation and on dashboard
Normalized all graphs to show plots > 100 for cases and deaths
Page title on dashboard, Global and Regional pages now shows totals
Added predictions to Global and U.S.A. compare graphs
Added social icons and a donate button
Added a new What's New Page to the website :-)
All logarithmic graphs now draw only after 100 cases / deaths on the scale
Changed terminology from Mortality Rate -> Case Fatality Rate
Moved graph legend on US Counties stats to top right
All graphs viewed on desktop can be saved to disk
Changed caching to auto-refresh whenever new data exists
Add percentages to daily change in stats pages for Global and United States
Integrate new Open Graph image so we have beautiful preview when sharing on social media
Download CSV available on all graphs
Offer sorting options on stats pages for confirmed, deaths, and mortality rate
Redesign region selector on all pages to look great on mobile
Add CSBS to footer as a new data source for U.S. County data
Add graph scale buttons linear/logarithmic for dashboard
